mapper.select: select d.code_chin_name as name, count(t.dsh_id) as value from DICT_CODE_LIB d left join t_ry_jbxx_dsh t on d.code_value =t.auditing_ztbg and t.geocode like #{depcode} AND t.geocode != #{code} and t.states='1' where code_type_no ='61' and code_value !=-1 group by code_chin_name

select nowmonth as nowmonth, nvl(c, 0) as bls from (select to_char((add_months(sysdate - numtoyminterval(1, 'YEAR'), level)), 'yyyy/mm') nowmonth FROM DUAL connect BY LEVEL <= 12) month left join (select to_char(b.submit_date, 'yyyy/mm') as sd, nvl(COUNT(1), 0) as c from bill b where bill_state='4' and substr(b.bill_no,0,6) like #{depcode} and substr(b.bill_no , 0 , 6) !=#{code} group by to_char(b.submit_date , 'yyyy/mm')) m on month.nowmonth = m.sd ORDER BY month.nowmonth

select substr(day,6) as day,nvl(c,0) as bls from (SELECT to_char (SYSDATE- LEVEL + 1, 'yyyy/mm/dd') day FROM DUAL connect BY LEVEL <= 31 ) days left join (select to_char(b.submit_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd') as sd, nvl(COUNT (1), 0) as c from bill b where bill_state='4' and substr(b.bill_no, 0, 6) like #{depcode} and substr(b.bill_no, 0, 6) !=#{code} group by to_char(b.submit_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd')) m on days.day = m.sd ORDER BY days.day

select desp, dis_order, count(bill_no) as bls from geocode g left join bill b on g.code = substr(b.jgsy_code, 0, 6) and bill_state = '4' where g.code like #{depcode} AND g.code != #{code} group by desp, dis_order order by dis_order

select jgsy_name, kbs, to_char(submit_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as today from (select jgsy_code, jgsy_name, sum(bz - zz - sykbs) as kbs, submit_date from (select a.jgsy_code, a.jgsy_name, nvl((dzq_bz + qebk_bz + cebt_bz + jfzl_bz), 0) bz, nvl((dzq_zz + qebk_zz + cebt_zz + jfzl_zz), 0) zz, 0 as sykbs, b.submit_date
from (select j.jgsy_code as jgsy_code, t.jgsy_name as jgsy_name, nvl(t.dzq_bz, 0) as dzq_bz, nvl(t.dzq_zz, 0) as dzq_zz, decode(t.jgtype, 'sy', t.qebk_bz, 0) qebk_bz, decode(t.jgtype, 'sy', t.cebt_bz, 0) cebt_bz, decode(t.jgtype, 'sy', t.jfzl_bz, 0) jfzl_bz, decode(t.jgtype, 'sy', t.qebk_zz, 0) qebk_zz, decode(t.jgtype, 'sy', t.cebt_zz, 0) cebt_zz, decode(t.jgtype, 'sy', t.jfzl_zz, 0) jfzl_zz from jgsy_common j left join v_bzzz t on j.jgsy_code = t.jgsy_code
where substr(j.jgsy_code, 1, 6) like #{depcode} and substr(j.jgsy_code, 1, 6) != #{code} and j.jgsy_states='1') a left join bill b on b.jgsy_code = a.jgsy_code
union all select a.jgsy_code, a.jgsy_name,
0 as bz, 0 as zz,
nvl((sykbs_xz + sykbs_sy), 0) as sykbs, b.submit_date
from (select jgsy_code as jgsy_code, jgsy_name as jgsy_name, case when bcd.bz_type = 'a' then bcd.reply_num - nvl(bcd.used_num, 0) else 0 end as sykbs_xz, case when bcd.bz_type in ('11', '12', '20') then bcd.reply_num - nvl(bcd.used_num, 0) else 0 end as sykbs_sy from bill_check bc, bill_check_detail bcd where bc.bill_state = '2' and bc.bill_valid = '1' and bc.bill_no = bcd.bill_no) a left join bill b on a.jgsy_code = b.jgsy_code where substr(b.jgsy_code, 1, 6) like #{depcode} and substr(b.jgsy_code, 1, 6) != #{code}) s group by jgsy_code, jgsy_name, submit_date) dr
where submit_date = ( select max(submit_date) from bill where jgsy_code = dr.jgsy_code) and to_char(submit_date, 'dd') = (select to_char(sysdate, 'dd') from dual)

select sum(rbrs) rbrs, sum(ltxrs) ltxrs, '${depName}' as depName from (select (case when t.bill_type = '1' then 1 else 0 end) as rbrs, (case when t.bill_type = '2' and bd.zbzt in ('04', '05') then 1 else 0 end) as ltxrs from BILL t left join bill_detail bd on t.bill_no = bd.bill_no where t.bill_state = '4' and bd.geocode like (select (case when g.code is null then '360000' when substr(g.code, 5, 2) = '00' then substr(g.code, 0, 4) || '%' else g.code end) depcode from geocode g where g.desp = #{depName}))
